name: swift-trpc
summary: A quick and easy way to get your tRPC API work in Swift environment
description:
This library is created because of the need to sometimes use tRPC APIs on native platforms.
It is only recommended that you use this as a tranitional solution when there's an existing
tRPC API and you want to use it in your Swift app without too much difficulty. It isn't
recommended that you use this as your primary and only solution in production, as it breaks
the type-safe philosofy of tRPC by itself, but if you want a challenge, you absolutely may.
(There is certainly no limitation for this in LICENSE :3 )
